SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
MEMBER_NO = #{query}
MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_EMAIL AS memberEmail, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, MEMBER_DEL_FL AS memberDelFl, ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate FROM MEMBER
MEMBER_NO = #{query}
MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL IN ('Y','N') AND B.BOARD_CODE = 4
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.READ_COUNT AS readCount, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boardWriteDate, B.BOARD_DEL_FL AS boardDelFl
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL IN ('Y','N') AND B.BOARD_CODE = 4
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = 5 AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL IN ('Y', 'N')
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO AND M.MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS boardWriteDate, B.BOARD_DEL_FL AS boardDelFl FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = 5 AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL IN ('Y','N')
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
